hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Regime Signals ETH Accumulation Phase
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas fees remain below 20 gwei for 5 consecutive days during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, ETH price appreciates by >4% within the next 7 trading days with >70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas indicates network underutilization, creating favorable conditions for accumulation. Historically precedes institutional/whale accumulation periods as transaction costs are minimized.
entry_conditions: ETH gas (daily avg) < 20 gwei for 5 consecutive days
No major network upgrades announced within 7 days
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH price fails to show positive bias (median return ≤0%) following 20+ historical low-gas periods meeting criteria.
